title: Daria
creator_credit: Susie Lewis, MTV and Paramount Pictures
brief_description: The unlikely heroine of this offbeat animated MTV series is a cynical and quick witted teenage outsider named Daria Morgendorffer. Her cutting barbs are of course a way of coping with her vacuous teenage sister, her indifferent parents and the cliquey high school she attends which would be complete hell if it wasn’t for her like minded best friend, Jane.
